sentences.en: Around 1910 motorized carriages were beginning to replace horse-drawn cabs.
sentences.cn: 大约从1910年起，机动车开始取代马车。

sentences.en: Can anything replace a mother's love and care?
sentences.cn: 有什么东西能取代母亲的爱和关怀 吗 ?

sentences.en: He replaced the book on the shelf.
I’m replacing Sue on the team.
Lectures have replaced the old tutorial system.
sentences.cn: 课堂授课取代了旧式的导师制。

sentences.en: New laws will soon replace existing legislation.
sentences.cn: 新法律即将取代现行法规。

sentences.en: Steel cable will be used to replace worn ropes.
sentences.cn: 将用钢缆替换磨损的绳索。

sentences.en: The new design will eventually replace all existing models.
sentences.cn: 新的设计最终将会取代所有现有的型号。

sentences.en: The new laws will be just as oppressive as those they replace.
sentences.cn: 新法律只会与原来的法律一样苛严。

sentences.en: This week he has chosen Peter Mandelson to replace Mo Mowlam.
sentences.cn: 本周他选择了彼得·曼德尔森来代替莫·摩兰姆。

sentences.en: Tomorrow's vote is unlikely to settle the question of who will replace their leader.
sentences.cn: 明天的投票不太可能确定将由谁取代他们的领袖。

sentences.en: Two of the tyres had to be replaced.
sentences.cn: 其中两个轮胎必须得换下来。

sentences.en: Under law, your employer has the right to hire a temporary worker to replace you.
sentences.cn: 根据法律规定，你的雇主有权雇用一名临时工来代替你。
我们更换有毛病的管子.

sentences.en: When your exhaust falls off, you have to replace it.
sentences.cn: 如果你的排气管脱落，应将其更换。

sentences.en: Who do you suppose will replace her on the show?
sentences.cn: 你觉得谁会代替她参加这场演出？

sentences.en: You may use these tools, only you must replace it after use.
sentences.cn: 这些工具你可以使用, 不过你用完之后得重新放好.

words.tran_cn: 可替换的；可置换的；可放在原处的
可替换性，替代性；置换能力
更换；复位；代替者；补充兵员
取代，代替；替换，更换；归还，偿还；把…放回原处

trans.tran_cn: 替换，以…取代，更新，把…放回(原处)
trans.tran_en: to start doing something instead of another person, or start being used instead of another thing

trans.tran_cn: 代替， 取代； 更换， 调换； 把…放回原处
trans.tran_en: to start doing something instead of another person, or start being used instead of another thing
